inclusion.criterion: acute ischemic stroke confirmed by computed tomography or a diffusion-weighed magnetic resonance imaging scan
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ability to understand and follow simple verbal instructions
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: National Institute of Health Stroke Scale score > 0
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no unrestricted movement of the lips
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: no receptive aphasia and no history of thoracic or abdominal surgery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: blood pressure >180/100 mm Hg more than twice in 24 h
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: significant pulmonary disease, angina, myocardial infarction or acute heart failure within three months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: presence of a severe visual disability and visual field defects
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: receiving medications that would influence the metabolic or cardiorespiratory responses to exercise
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient presented with left upper and lower extremity weakness, associated with dark visual spot in right eye, right facial numbness, facial drop and slurred speech. He has a history of hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism.
